title: Servers go down in middle of a game?
body:
I've never had any issues of disconnecting before ever. All it tells me is that it's unable to connect to the PVP.net servers and it won't let me reconnect to a game that it kicked me from with the "attempting to reconnect" BS.

I hope this doesn't flag me as leaving the game, because the server maintenance kicked me from it.

EDIT: If it wasn't clear enough, I do understand that the server resets are going on this moment. I was just curious if it actually kicked you from the game or just stopped you from making a new one.

replies.body: Hiccups can occur during a patch update, and we try to let everyone know in advance through our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page.  Hopefully everything should be okay now, but let me know if you're still having issues connecting to a game.
It just took be by surprise, that's all. I expected there to be an in-game notification of some kind, but I got scared when it just all-of-the-suddently dropped the connection.

I just had the same thing happen I just started a match only like 4 min in and I tried reconnecting and then it took me to the log on menu and the launch button isn't even orange so I cant even click to log on it did its updates and patches but no I cant play and I don't want to have to wait for like 20 min every time I start a queue to play
